effect: When the Pokémon's HP drops below half, its Attack, Special Attack, and Speed are raised by one stage each, but its Defense and Special Defense are lowered by one stage each.
synergies: Berries that activate at low HP
Pokémon with high base HP to survive the threshold
notes: Exclusive to Clodsire and its pre-evolution. High-risk, high-reward ability that favors offensive sweeps but leaves the user more vulnerable.
